titleStmt.title: Speculem Sherlockianum, or, A looking-glass in which the admirers of Mr. Sherlock may behold the man, as to his accuracy, judgement, orthodoxy by an obedient son of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Hickman, Henry, d. 1692.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
